title: (x) B.B.F.F. shield - Times {Yves}
content:
Whats the font for the letters B.B.F.F in this picture? Probably hard since i only have these two letters, but it doesn't have to be exact match.   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130925im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69384.png)
